Text: OH and GREAT NEWS, due to advances in Bit torrent technology I no longer have to ARCHIVE these to overcome original limitations on the number of files a single torrent could hold.   That limit is now high enough so I can seed about 1.5GB of Karaoke files each time and you can just look at the 518 tracks here inside the torrent by clicking on the blue 518 at the top left of this page under Type Audio> Other :-)

OOPS:  I forget to add the [Karaoke] at the end of each track title SO BE VERY CAREFUL out there in Windoze land not to over write your classic MP3 Audio collection with the Karaoke sound track...

Windows will of course warn you, but how many read or act on the 'are you sure' bit..  Oh Yeah you do, of course... Yeah Right ;)

Tack för denna men har du något med svenska artister som har svenska texter så vore jag tacksam!!

Tack Roffe
